title: Chrome for iPad makes it easier to multitask with Split View support
text:
Chrome for iPad makes it easier to multitask with Split View support 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Apple's Split View feature in iOS 9 is great for some light multitasking on the iPad, but initially it's been mostly supported by Apple's ow...
